    Used for the actual storage of "schema state".

    IndexReaderCache
    Cache which maps IndexDescriptors to IndexReaders.
    KernelImpl
    This is the Neo4j Kernel, an implementation of the Kernel API which is an internal component used by Cypher and the Core API (the API under org.neo4j.graphdb).
    KernelStatement
    A resource efficient implementation of Statement.
    KernelTransactionImplementation  
    KernelTransactionImplementation.Statistics  
    KernelTransactionImplementationHandle
    A KernelTransactionHandle that wraps the given KernelTransactionImplementation.
    KernelTransactions
    Central source of transactions in the database.
    KernelTransactions.GlobalKernelTransactionPool  
    KernelTransactions.LocalKernelTransactionPool  
    KernelTransactionsSnapshot
    An instance of this class can get a snapshot of all currently running transactions and be able to tell later if all transactions which were running when it was constructed have closed.
    KernelTransactionsSnapshot.Tx  
    LeaseService.NoLeaseClient  
    LookupFilter
    When looking up nodes by a property value, we have to do a two-stage check.
    LuceneIndexValueValidator
    Validates values that are about to get indexed into a Lucene index.
    ReadOnlyTransactionCommitProcess
    For databases in dbms.read_only mode, the implementation of TransactionCommitProcess will simply always throw an exception on commit, to ensure that no changes are made.
    RelationshipDataExtractor  
    RestrictedSchemaWrite  
    SchemaStateKey
    Recommended way to create keys for SchemaState, to guarantee control over equality uniqueness.
    StatementQueryRegistry  
    TestCommand
    Sometimes a test just needs a command, no particular command, just a command... this could be that command.
    TestCommandReaderFactory  
    TestCommandReaderFactory.TestCommandReader  
    TokenAccess<R>  
    TokenAccess.TokenIterator<T>  
    TokenHoldersIdLookup  
    TransactionExecutionStatistic  
    TransactionQueue
    Serves as a reusable utility for building a chain of TransactionToApply instances, where the instances themselves form the linked list.
    TransactionRepresentationCommitProcess  
    TransactionToApply
    A chain of transactions to apply.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    KernelTransactionImplementation.TransactionWriteState
    It is not allowed for the same transaction to perform database writes as well as schema writes.
